DOC.brief_summary: The objective study : 1 ) determine vaccenic acid ( trans-11-octadecenoic , naturally occur trans fatty acid isomer ruminant animal product ) raise LDL cholesterol quantitatively comparable manner mixed trans fatty acid isomer partially hydrogenate vegetable oil 3 % energy intake , 2 ) determine cis-9 , trans-11 conjugate linoleic acid ( naturally occur polyunsaturated fatty acid ruminant animal product ) raise LDL cholesterol compare control diet , 3 ) demonstrate mixed trans fatty acid isomer partially hydrogenate vegetable oil raise LDL cholesterol compare low trans fatty acid diet .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Trans Fatty Acids From Ruminant Sources Risk Factors Cardiovascular Disease
DOC.criteria: BMI 20 38 kg/m2 Age 25 65 year intervention Fasting glucose < 126 mg/dl Blood pressure < 160/100 mm Hg ( control certain medication ) Total plasma cholesterol < 280 mg/dl Fasting triglycerides < 300 mg/dl Use prescription overthecounter medication supplement alter lipid metabolism . History presence kidney disease , liver disease , gout , certain cancer , thyroid disease , gastrointestinal , metabolic disease , malabsorption syndrome . Type 2 diabetes require use oral antidiabetic agent insulin . History eat disorder dietary pattern consistent dietary intervention ( e.g. , vegetarian , low fat diet , high protein diet ) . Women give birth previous 12 month , pregnant woman , woman plan become pregnant become pregnant study lactate woman . Volunteers routinely participate heavy exercise volunteer initiate exercise program study . Volunteers lose 10 % body weight within last 12 month plan initiate weight loss program next 10 month . Use prescription overthecounter antiobesity medication supplement ( e.g. , phenylpropanolamine , ephedrine , caffeine , least 6 month prior start study ) history surgical intervention obesity . Active cardiovascular disease ( heart attack procedure within past three month participation cardiac rehabilitation program within last three month , stroke history/treatment transient ischemic attack past three month , document history pulmonary embolus past six month ) . Smokers tobacco user ( 6 month prior start study ) . Unable unwilling give inform consent communicate study staff . Selfreport alcohol substance abuse within past twelve month and/or current acute treatment rehabilitation program problem ( longterm participation Alcoholics Anonymous exclusion ) . Other medical , psychiatric , behavioral factor judgment Principal Investigator may interfere study participation ability follow intervention protocol .
